title: Deutschland sucht den SuperStar (German "Idol") logo - (please no "Kaufmann" solutions)
content:
hi can you help me with this?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100202085945im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Logo-dsds_4258.gif)

is it customized or is there a font that matches the "SuperStar" and is not "Kaufmann"?

Thanks!
author: flabrea

comments.content: This actually looks quite crappy, with some dodgy curves and icky character shapes, so it wouldn't surprise me it was designed specifically for the show.

yes.. loox like it was made with a brush in Photoshop or roughly with Illustrator  
check the e  
it is two parts put together
